title: Traits and Features
content: e influence.While Frenzied, you cant be Charmed or Frightened, and Calm Emotions no longer ends your rage. Berserker Lvl 6 (Barbarian Subclass) Brutal Critical Class Feature You've trained to strike swift and true. When you land a Critical Hit, you roll an extra damage die as well as the normal additional critical dice. Barbarian Lvl 9 Unstable Backlash Subclass Feature While enraged, when you take damage or fail a saving throw, you trigger another Wild Magic effect that replaces the current one
